experience.title: software_developer
description: Proficient in creating and maintaining applications using the Spring Boot framework. I have knowledge in JPA, JUnit Jupiter for testing, native queries, test-driven development, solid design principles, and PostgreSQL database management.

Actively involved in modernizing systems, including the creation of a new deployment system with Java 17 and the successful migration of a legacy Java 8 API to Java 17, significantly improving system efficiency and maintainability.
Developed dynamic and responsive user interfaces using technologies ranging from React to Angular.

experience.title: infrastructure_analyst
description: Maintenance of Windows servers, administration of Exchange, DHCP, DNS, backups, AD, firewalls, and proxies
Resolved day-to-day issues involving networks, user support, and file and application storage
Performed hardware and software installation/configuration, system migrations, and software tool updates
